Db2Excel.name: 统计
Db2Excel.sql: select 'GSM' 制式,'ERICSSON' 厂商,平台对应类型 分类,count(*) 参数数量 from( select max(t0.id) 规范中所在行,max(replace(t1.table_related,'CM.G_E_C_','')) 网元类型,max(upper(t0.colname)) 中文名,max(replace(t1.table_related,'CM.G_E_C_','')) 平台对应类型,max(t1.param_name) 平台对应字段,max(replace(t1.table_related,'CM.G_E_C_','')) 厂家对应表名,max(t1.param_name) 厂家对应字段名 from wuyg_param_gsm_ericsson t0,dataset_info t1 where colname not like '%无%' and vendor='ERICSSON' and datatype='参数'and upper(colname) =param_name group by t1.table_related,upper(t0.colname) order by upper(t0.colname) ) group by 平台对应类型 order by 1,2,3

Db2Excel.name: BSC
Db2Excel.sql: select t0.id 规范中所在行,replace(t1.table_related,'CM.G_E_C_','') 网元类型,upper(t0.colname) 中文名,replace(t1.table_related,'CM.G_E_C_','') 平台对应类型,t1.param_name 平台对应字段,replace(t1.table_related,'CM.G_E_C_','') 厂家对应表名,t1.param_name 厂家对应字段名 from wuyg_param_gsm_ericsson t0,dataset_info t1 where colname not like '%无%' and vendor='ERICSSON' and datatype='参数'and upper(colname) =param_name and table_related='CM.G_E_C_BSC' order by table_related,param_name

Db2Excel.name: CHANNEL_GROUP
Db2Excel.sql: select max(t0.id) 规范中所在行,max(replace(t1.table_related,'CM.G_E_C_','')) 网元类型,max(upper(t0.colname)) 中文名,max(replace(t1.table_related,'CM.G_E_C_','')) 平台对应类型,max(t1.param_name) 平台对应字段,max(replace(t1.table_related,'CM.G_E_C_','')) 厂家对应表名,max(t1.param_name) 厂家对应字段名 from wuyg_param_gsm_ericsson t0,dataset_info t1 where colname not like '%无%' and vendor='ERICSSON' and datatype='参数'and upper(colname) =param_name and table_related='CM.G_E_C_CHANNEL_GROUP' group by upper(t0.colname) order by upper(t0.colname)

Db2Excel.sql: select max(t0.id) 规范中所在行,max(replace(t1.table_related,'CM.G_E_C_','')) 网元类型,max(upper(t0.colname)) 中文名,max(replace(t1.table_related,'CM.G_E_C_','')) 平台对应类型,max(t1.param_name) 平台对应字段,max(replace(t1.table_related,'CM.G_E_C_','')) 厂家对应表名,max(t1.param_name) 厂家对应字段名 from wuyg_param_gsm_ericsson t0,dataset_info t1 where colname not like '%无%' and vendor='ERICSSON' and datatype='参数'and upper(colname) =param_name and table_related='CM.G_E_C_EXTERNAL_CELL' group by upper(t0.colname) order by upper(t0.colname)

Db2Excel.name: MSC
Db2Excel.sql: select t0.id 规范中所在行,t0.netype 网元类型,upper(t0.colname) 中文名,replace(t1.table_related,'CM.G_E_C_','') 平台对应类型,t1.param_name 平台对应字段,replace(t1.table_related,'CM.G_E_C_','') 厂家对应表名,t1.param_name 厂家对应字段名 from wuyg_param_gsm_ericsson t0,dataset_info t1 where colname not like '%无%' and vendor='ERICSSON' and datatype='参数'and upper(colname) =param_name and table_related='CM.G_E_C_MSC' order by table_related,param_name

Db2Excel.name: PRIORITY_PROFILE

Db2Excel.name: UTRAN_EXTERNAL_CELL
Db2Excel.sql: select max(t0.id) 规范中所在行,max(replace(t1.table_related,'CM.G_E_C_','')) 网元类型,max(upper(t0.colname)) 中文名,max(replace(t1.table_related,'CM.G_E_C_','')) 平台对应类型,max(t1.param_name) 平台对应字段,max(replace(t1.table_related,'CM.G_E_C_','')) 厂家对应表名,max(t1.param_name) 厂家对应字段名 from wuyg_param_gsm_ericsson t0,dataset_info t1 where colname not like '%无%' and vendor='ERICSSON' and datatype='参数'and upper(colname) =param_name and table_related='CM.G_E_C_UTRAN_EXTERNAL_CELL' group by upper(t0.colname) order by upper(t0.colname)

Db2Excel.name: 拆分参数
Db2Excel.sql: select id 规范中所在行,netype 网元类型,cnname 规范参数名,upper(colname) 拆分参数 from wuyg_param_gsm_ericsson where id in (select id from wuyg_param_gsm_ericsson group by id having count(*)>1) order by id

Db2Excel.name: 厂家不支持
Db2Excel.sql: select id 规范中所在行,netype 网元类型,upper(cnname) 参数名,colname 厂家不支持原因 from wuyg_param_gsm_ericsson where colname like '%无%'
